Column about political cartoonists who stopped drawing political cartoons, with sample cartoons and anecdotes about George Cruikshank (1792-1878), Charles Dana Gibson (1867-1944), Robert Minor (1884-1952), Boardman Robinson (1876-1952), Walt Kelly (1913-1973), and Ron Cobb (1938- ).
